IN RE: ADOPTION OF E.R., a Minor Petition of: F.J. and T.R., Natural Parents In re: Adoption of: F.R., a Minor Petition of: F.J. and T.R., Natural Parents No. 37 WAL 2018
No. 38 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 29, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 29th day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
